articles.description: You might have noticed Patriots rookie outside linebacker Josh Uche in New England's front seven on Sunday. He was the fast one.
articles.content: It’s a small sample size (Uche has played just 111 defensive snaps this season after sitting out the first seven weeks) but the Patriots are allowing just 5.26 yards per pass with Uche on the field a… [+1970 chars]
